attributes.summary: Personal wedding planner in your pocket
attributes.description: A wedding planner is usually a professional who assists with the design, planning and management of a client's wedding. Why not make an app which can handle all that?
features: Wedding checklist
Wedding guests list
Countdown to the wedding day
Option to search for a venue and suppliers
Budget tool

attributes.summary: Takes people from their couch to running 5 kilometers
attributes.description: The program utilizes a concept called interval training - moving at different speeds throughout a running session - and lays out exactly what to do every day for 6-12 weeks after starting.
features: User can see information about the training program
User can start the training session
User is informed what to do during the session
User can review their progress

attributes.description: In classic sudoku, the objective is to fill a 9 x 9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3 Ã— 3 subgrids that compose the grid (also called "boxes", "blocks", or "regions") contain all of the digits from 1 to 9. The puzzle setter provides a partially completed grid, which for a well-posed puzzle has a single solution.
features: User can see the starting grid with numbers
User can select an empty grid cell
User can select what number to place in the cell
User is notified when the gird is successfully filled
User can chose difficulty of the game

attributes.description: Lorem ipsum is a placeholder text commonly used to demonstrate the visual form of a document or a typeface without relying on meaningful content.
features: User can specify number of words to generate
User can specify number of paragraphs to generate
User can copy generated text
User can share generated text

attributes.description: Creating a simple piano will let you learn how to handle sound in your app.
features: User can see piano keyboard
User can press a key to hear the corresponding sound
User can press multiple keys at once

attributes.description: Get political, entertainment, sports, global, local and other news all in one place
features: User can select type of news, for example: sport, art, politics etc.
User can select language for news
User can see news feed of selected types
User can filter the feed
User can bookmark a news
User can share the news

attributes.description: Snake is a video game genre where the player maneuvers a growing line that becomes a primary obstacle to itself.
features: User can direct the snake
User get points for good play
User see the score at the and of the game

attributes.description: It's hard to remember a long web address, especially if it has a lot of characters, symbols and numbers.
features: User can see a text field
User can paste a long URL
Short URL is generated
User can see the short URL
User can copy and share the short URL
User can have an option to select URL shortener service

attributes.summary: Keep track of your mood changes
attributes.description: Such an app allows users to add and evaluate their activities, events, and locations the whole day. Then the app can analyze their past actions and looks for the patterns.
features: User can enter their current mood
User can select a predefined mood
User can add notes related to the current mood
User can review entries recorded previously
User can edit entries
User can delete entries

attributes.description: A traditional die is a cube with each of its six faces marked with a different number of dots from one to six. Dice may also have other number of faces with numerals or symbols instead of dots.
features: User can see a dice
User can press a button to simulate dice roll
User can see the result of the roll
User can select number of dice to simulate
User can select different types of dice

attributes.description: We all have important events we look forward to in life, birthdays, anniversaries, and holidays to name a few. Wouldn't it be nice to have an app that counts down the months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds to an event? Countdown Timer is just that app!
features: User can input a name of an event
User can input or select time and date of an event
User can start the countdown
User can see the remaining time to the event
Countdown timers persist across sessions
Notification reminds about the event

attributes.description:
Emojis have become the lingua franca of modern society. They are a fun and fast way to communicate, but an also extremely expressive mechanism for communicating emotions and reactions.
The objective of the Emoji Translator app is to translate text entered by the user into an equivalent string of emojis, translated from one or more words in the original text, and words for which there is no corresponding emoji.
features: User can enter a string of words, numbers, and punctuation into a text box
User can click a button to translate words in the entered text into their corresponding emojis
User can add option for negative valuesUser can see text elements in the entered text translated to their equivalent emojis. Text elements for which there is no emoji will be left unchanged.
User can translate emojis to text

attributes.description: Generate a random number between a defined minimum and maximum.
features: User can define minimum and maximum values
User can press a button to generate the random number
User can add option for negative values
User can add option for decimal numbers

attributes.description: The classic To-Do application where a user can write down things they want to accomplish.
features: User can add a new task
User can mark a task as completed
User can delete a task
User can edit a task
Tasks can be visible in a list
Tasks can have details like: created date, due date or priority
User can put tasks in groups

attributes.description: The app allows storing user's body weight
features: User can input current body weight
Time of measurement is stored
User can see previous records and changes over time
User can change units of measurement

attributes.description: Calculators are not only one of the most useful tools available, but they are also a great way to understand UI and event processing in an application
features: A display showing current number entered or the result of the last operation
Entry pad containing buttons for the digits 0-9 and mathematical operations
Additional buttons for clearing the input or saving calculations in memory
User can enter numbers as sequences of digits
User can select operation to be performed and see the result on the display

attributes.description: All your expenses in one place
features: User can add a new expense
User can edit existing expense
User can see statistics for the last week, month, year
User can set the currencies

attributes.summary: Managing time efficiently using Pomodoro technique
attributes.description: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method developed by Francesco Cirillo in the late 1980s. The technique uses a timer to break down work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks - 5 minutes.
features: User can see a timer for the working session, typically 25 minutes
After the working session is over, the user can see a timer for the break session, typically 5 minutes
User can start, pause, stop and reset the timers
User can customize duration of the timers before starting
User can set a long break session, typically every 4th break session
Sound notifications when sessions starts/ends

attributes.description: Allow users to generate custom memes by adding text over an image.
features: User can select an image for editing
User can add text in various parts of the image
User can select color of the text
User can select the size and font of the text
User can save the resulting meme
User can share the meme on social media

attributes.description: The objective of the Recipe app is to help the user manage recipes in a way that will make them easy to follow.
features: User can see a list of recipes names
User can search for a specific dish or an ingredient
User can select a recipe to see its details
User can add their own receipt

attributes.description: Create an application that will allow users to search for books by entering a query (Title, Author, etc).
features: User can enter a search query
After submitting the query, API is called which gives results relevant to the query
User can see the results with data like: title, author, picture, published date, etc

attributes.description: Create and store notes for later purpose
features: User can create a note
User can edit a note
User can delete a note
User can see created notes after restarting the app
Notes can have details like: created date or a specific category

attributes.description: An app to keep record of important moments of your life
features: User can add an event
User can edit an event
User can delete an event
User can edit the date of the event
An event might have photos, videos or other data along with the description
User can setup a password to limit access to the diary
User can search for an event
User can bookmark an event

attributes.summary: Also knows as noughts and crosses, or Xs and Os
attributes.description: Popular game in a digital form. You can learn how to create game logic and program AI ;)
features: User can select who starts first
User can select if he uses X or O
AI tries to win
Score is displayed after the game

attributes.description: A tool to convert between number of different units can be vary useful.
features: User can select a type of measurement, like temperature, length, volume, etc
User can select two units for conversion between them
User can enter a value for conversion
The converted value is displayed after a button click or automatically updated while user types
User can save favorite conversion types

attributes.description: Real-time or delayed chat interface where users can interact with each other by sending messages.
features: User can register/sign in
User can enter a text and send it as a message
User can select who to message
User can see messages he received
User can send images and other files

attributes.summary: Keeping records of spending on fuel
attributes.description: The app might be very helpful for car owners. It would let them keeping track on spending on fuel and distance travelled.
features: User can enter the amount of fuel
User can enter the cost of fuel
User can enter odometer reading
User can enter date of refueling
User can change units
User can see statistics about car's fuel efficiency, distance traveled, etc

attributes.summary: Finding a place to park a vehicle
attributes.description: Finding a place to park could a very hard in busy locations. This app can make it easier.
features: User can enter a location to search for available parking spaces
User can select a place on the map
User can see the route to the selected place

attributes.description: Simple app where user can tap a button to increase the count. Good opportunity to showcase your UI skills
features: User can see the current counter value
User can press a button to increase the counter
User can press a button to decrease the counter
User can edit the starting value of the counter
User can reset the counter

attributes.summary: Testing knowledge in a fun way
attributes.description: Practice and test your knowledge by answering questions in a quiz application.
features: User can see a question with 4 possible answers
After selecting an answer, user is presented with another question
The situation repeats until the quiz is finished
At the end, the user can see statistics about their answers
User can share the results

attributes.summary: Getting the right stuff at the shop
attributes.description: The app helps you when shopping. Don't waste time thinking why are you actually in this shop.
features: User can add a new item
User can edit an item
User can mark the item as bought
User can delete an item

attributes.description: Build an app to organize your daily life. Creating such an app can teach you about calendars, time zones, and how problematic they are in programming.
features: User can create an event
User can edit an event
User can delete an event
Notifications remind the user about the events

attributes.description: A weather application to get the temperature, weather condition of a particular city.
features: User can enter the name of a city
User can see the current temperature, wind and other details for the selected city
User can see the forecast for few days for selected city
User can change units for temperature, wind speed, etc
